content: 6 row row 1 rs k26 byf turn in st st row 2 k10 k2tog 2 times k10 byf turn 26 sts row 7 k5 k2tog k2 4 times k4 21 sts row 3 k9 k2tog 2 times k11 24 sts row 8 to 10 starting on a ws purl row work 3 row in st st break the working yarn divide the sts across two needles 12 sts on each use a third 3 25mm single row 11 k5 k2tog k1 4 times k4 17 sts pointed needle and grass green yarn to work a row 12 to 14 starting on a ws purl row work 3 three-needle bind off the centre spine of the leaf row in st st row 15 k1 k2tog k1 5 times k1 12 sts mistletoe stalk row 16 purl make 1 per sprig using a 3 25mm dpn and grass row 17 k2tog 6 times 6 sts green yarn pick up and knit 2 sts along the side pull through to cast off edge of one mistletoe leaf then pick up and knit a further 2 sts along the side edge of the 2nd leaf with the rs facing you work i-cord on the 4 sts molehill using two dpns for 8 row cast off all sts make 1 per mole follow the bunny s rabbit hole patt in woody brown yarn mistletoe berries make 2 per sprig follow the holly berries patt in making up for the molehill sew side edges decrease to pale cream yarn make a circle and weave in tails on ws for the head sew side edges decrease stuff and sew cast on edge onto the hole slightly off-centre embroider making up for the leaves weave in the yarn tails the nose in palest pink yarn in layered horizontal make up each berry following the holly berry stitches over the cast off end and the feet in a 3 instructions using pale cream yarn for stuffing stitches each on the molehill sew on two 6mm buttons for eyes on either side of the head and embroider a highlight besides each eye in a slanting stitch in white embroidery thread or mending wool when sewing this finished piece autumn warmth wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 11 of 19 onto the wreath add some toy filling underneath row 1 rs k2tog 6 times 6 sts the molehill to pad it out pull through to cast off mouse mouse tail make 1 per mouse cast on 2 sts using 3 25mm dpns in mouse grey yarn using two dpns work i- mouse body cord for 20 row pull through to cast off make 1 per mouse cast on 9 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and making up for the body sew side edges decrease mouse grey yarn start at the bottom end stuffing as you sew and gather cast on sts decrease at bottom end note the seam runs down underside row 1 to 2 starting on
